claims.text: "About two-thirds of those with negative geared properties have a taxable income of less than $80,000 ..."

claims.text: "In four years we have more than tripled Victoria's share of Chinese investment in Australia."

claims.text: "Under [Scott Morrison] and the Liberals, out-of-pocket costs to visit a GP are up 25 per cent and out-of-pocket costs to visit a specialist are up 40 per cent — because of the Liberals' & Nationals' Medicare freeze."

claimReview.title: Linda Burney says Australia is the only first world nation with a colonial history that doesn't recognise its first people in its constitution. Is she correct?
